Package ghm.follow.font

Class Summary
FontSelectionPanel FontSelectionPanel v1.1, copied without functional modification from http://gregmerrill.imagineis.com/fontSelectionPanel.
FontSelectionPanel.FontStyleList Represents a list of the four font styles: plain, bold, italic, and bold italic
FontSelectionPanel.ListCellRenderer An implementation of ListCellRenderer which right justifies all cells.
FontSelectionPanel.PublicChangeObservable Subclass of Observable which allows public access to the setChanged() method.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidFontException Indicates that an invalid font is currently specified
InvalidFontSizeException Indicates that an invalid font size is currently specified
NoFontFamilySelectedException Indicates that no font family is currently selected
NoFontSizeSpecifiedException Indicates that no font size is currently specified
NoFontStyleSelectedException Indicates that no font style is currently selected
